subject: Quick-Dry Breathable Function Shirts [AD]
body:
BC001 & BC002



Dear Sir / Madam :



We are a manufacturer of Cool-Tec - Quick Dry function sportswear. 


Hereafter is the products information and price quotation :

* Remarks :
1. The Cool-Tec - Quick Dry function shirts are suitable for sportswear, cycling clothing, football clothing and jogging clothing.
  2. It keeps the wearer's body fresh and increases the performance of the wearer.
3. We can put printing or embroidery as customerized design.
  4. All goods can be attached with the quality certified hangtag - "Cool-Tec & Quick Dry".







 
  5. Cost of transportation by sea / by air can be quoted you immediately.



 
* We are also producing other sportswear and outerwear as following :  < click for more information > 




1. Windbreakers & Jackets
2. Parka 


3. Fleece Wear

  - The minimum quantity of each style is 10-50 pcs per colour in different sizes. 
  - Your designated logo can be applied on the garments as embroidery or printing.
- Please send us your design for our quotation and sampling. 
- For more information about our sportswear and outerwear products, please click here. 




Please send your inquiry to our e-mail: promowear@21cn.com


Best regards.
Miss Ping


 FUJIAN HUA MIN CORPORATION
  Email: promowear@21cn.com
